title: The redemption of time, or a sermon containing very good remedies for them that haue mis-spent their time shewing how they should redeeme it comfortably. By M.W. Master in Arts.
author: Whately, William, 1583-1639.
publisher: Printed by T. E[ast] for Thomas Man, dwelling in Pater-noster-Row, and the signe of the Talbot,
notes: Print faded and show-through; pages stained.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
